name: SCP office escape
description: this was just an idea i had for a game, i wanted to make a horror game, and also wanted to make it scp themed, if i finished it, it was supposed to be more like a survival game, where you have to survive in your office until help arrives, having interesting interactions with the scp's along the way, and pro tip while talking to the scp press talk first then next lol, file is called bombs lol
